title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repository: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally via a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; chat, generate, and pull models via Ollama’s REST API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package adding Ollama LLM and embeddings to LangChain’s Python ecosystem.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web UI for Ollama: chat history, model management, multi-user, dark/light themes.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive TUI wrapper around Ollama CLI with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented-generation example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with strongly-typed models and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that test and benchmark Ollama models inside containers.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat, generate code, and manage models from the sidebar.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted note writing using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language wrapper for Ollama with async/await and native JSON parsing.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community-maintained Go client for Ollama with context cancellation and streaming support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using Ollama models and threads responses.
